Generation III.Ruby: Beautifly 's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pok é mon , just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
Generation III.Sapphire: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pok é mon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
Generation III.Emerald: Its colorfully patterned wings are its most prominent feature. It flies through flower-covered fields collecting pollen. It attacks ferociously when angered.
Generation III.FireRed: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.

Generation IV.Diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
Generation IV.Pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
Generation IV.Platinum: Despite its looks, it is aggressive. It jabs with its long, thin mouth if disturbed while collecting pollen.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.

Generation VI.Y: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Beautifly's favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: When flower fields bloom, it flits around, collecting pollen. Despite its appearance, it is savage.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon. In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase away Combee as they try to gather nectar.
